QuestData.Title: Get Shredded
QuestData.Description:
I was scouting ahead while you were wreaking havoc in the mine.
Spotted a hulking, armored shredder in their lumber yard. Bet we could do some real damage with that thing!
I tried to start it up, but looks like it might be out of juice. Maybe they forgot to charge it?
See if you can grab a fresh power core from one of the other shredders nearby.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find an Energized Power Core and install it in the Prototype Shredder MK-03.
QuestData.RewardText: <As the key clicks into place and the new core activates, a low hum begins emitting from the shredder. It accelerates into a high pitched whirring as the instrument panels light up all over the cockpit.>
